1.title: FIFA World Cup - Baby Pickle is a Ninja/Marley is a Tiger

episode of.title: Tom's Paint Shop in Car City (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Tom the Tow Truck, the famous truck of Car City, is also fond of painting ! Tom welcomes his truck friends into his brand new Paint Shop and transforms them into their favorite character. Tom The Tow Truck can paint anything that comes from his friends' imagination. Welcome to Tom's Paint Shop !

imdb.plot outline: Tom the Tow Truck, the famous truck of Car City, is also fond of painting . Tom welcomes his truck friends into his brand new Paint Shop and transforms them into their favorite character. Batman, Minions, Spiderman, Santa, Space Ships, Unicorns My Little Pony and so much more . Tom The Tow Truck can paint anything that comes from his friends' imagination. Welcome to Tom's Paint Shop.
